title: NPC arranges special screening of ‘Kabir’ for ‘Women Journalists Eid Sports Gala’ participants
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 09 (APP):National Press Club (NPC), in collaboration with the Women Journalists Caucus and Capital Premier League, arranged a special screening of ‘Kabir’ to honor participants of the ‘Women Journalists Eid Sports Gala’.
The special screening took place at 8:00 PM late Tuesday at Centaurus Mall.
Kabir was one of the most successful films released on the occasion of Eid-ul-Fitr this year.
The event provided a unique opportunity for participants and esteemed guests to meet the lead cast of the film.
The movie received an overwhelming response from the participants and other attendees.
Moreover, prizes were distributed among the winning and runner-up teams of the cricket tournament, celebrating their outstanding performance in the recent sports gala.
